trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports automatic background pagination and tracking content positions across repaginations in addition to the methods and properties of its own base class.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个后台自动分页和跟踪内容位置支持在重新分页期间除了的方法和属性的其自己的基类的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: By default, a DynamicDocumentPaginator will automatically pre-paginate content in the background (this process begins when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, which is the default setting).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，DynamicDocumentPaginator 将自动预分页内容在后台 (此过程开始时<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>是`true`，这是默认设置)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, the layout will also be repaginated due to changes in content or changes in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>是`true`，还由于内容中的更改或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>重新分页布局</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event occurs upon completion of pagination (or repagination) of one or more pages, such as in the following situations: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events occur as content is paginated in the background.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>事件发生在完成分页 （或重新分页） 的一个或多个页，如在以下情况:-<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>事件发生在后台对内容进行分页。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation, the event may occur upon paginating one or multiple pages (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> specifies which pages have been paginated).
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于实现，该事件时，可能出现分页一个或多个页面 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>指定已分页的页)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> may cause an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event to occur if the page specified has not been paginated.
trans-unit.target: -调用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>可能会导致<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>事件发生后如果指定的页未已分页。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if background pagination is enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) but pagination has only been completed up to the third page, a call of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 6 will cause pages four, five, six, and seven to be paginated.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果已启用后台分页 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`)，但仅到第三页的调用已完成分页<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>用 6 参数将可能的原因页四个、 5、 6 和七个进行分页。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon completion, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event will be raised with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 4 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 4.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>将与引发事件<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 4 和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 4。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: - With background pagination enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), a change in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> on flow-format content, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, may cause repagination and associated <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events.
trans-unit.target: -与启用后台分页 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) 中的更改<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>上的内容流格式，如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>，可能会导致重新分页以及相关联<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> has no effect in repagination on fixed-format content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, where the visual page size does not affect the layout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>在中不起重新分页上格式固定的内容，如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>，其中 visual 页大小不会影响布局。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event also occurs when background pagination is disabled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>禁用后台分页时，也会发生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is only one page of content and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `false`), calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 0 will result in two events: 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果没有只有一页的内容和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>= `false`)，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>参数为 0 将导致两个事件︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 1.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>事件和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 1。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> for the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，则返回<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>指定<xref:System.Object>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The object to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>的给定的对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，返回指定的从零开始的页码<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to the `contentPosition` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: 如果前的页`contentPosition`尚未格式化，它们将对进行分页同步之前返回请求的页号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPageNumber, but with asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>提供类似的功能作为 GetPageNumber，但与异步操作。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要其页码内容位置。

trans-unit.source: An representing zero-based page number where the specified contentPosition appears.
trans-unit.target: 表示从零开始的页码其中指定 contentPosition 显示。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式返回 (通过此方法引发<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref>事件) 指定的从零开始的页码<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消此方法的异步操作的唯一方法是以取消所有异步操作。

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的其他重载此方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The page number is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件参数之一的情况下，页号传递到事件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page number.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>有关如何使用此方法以获取页码。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要其页码内容位置。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式返回 (通过此方法引发<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref>事件) 指定的从零开始的页码<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的此重载使可以取消此异步操作不会取消所有异步操作。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve the page number of a given `contentPosition` asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 以下步骤说明了如何检索的页码给定`contentPosition`以异步方式。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>委托并将其接收的通知添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageNumberAsync specifying the `contentPosition` desired and a unique `userState` object that will be used to identify the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GetPageNumberAsync 指定`contentPosition`需以及唯一`userState`将用于标识异步任务的对象。

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当发生该事件时，会调用的委托，两个比较事件的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>。<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A>具有原始 GetPageNumberAsync 属性`userState`参数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page number is ready.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>。<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A>属性与匹配原始 GetPageNumberAsync `userState`、 操作已完成和页码已准备就绪。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> property will also match the original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parameter.) 5.
trans-unit.target: ( <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>。<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A>属性还将匹配原始 GetPageNumberAsync`contentPosition`参数。)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs> 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property contains the zero-based page number of the specified `contentPosition`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>。<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A>属性包含指定的从零开始的页码`contentPosition`。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A> provides similar functionality as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, but for synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>提供类似的功能作为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>，但为同步操作。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position element to return the page number of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的页码的内容位置元素。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 异步任务唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>已完成。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the position of the specified page in the document's content.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取指定的页中文档的内容的位置。

trans-unit.source: The page whose position is needed.
trans-unit.target: 所需的位置页。

trans-unit.source: A representing the position of page.
trans-unit.target: A 表示的位置 page 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pagination is performed automatically in the background in response to certain events, such as a change in page size.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值分页是否在响应特定事件，例如，在页面大小发生更改在后台自动执行。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, pagination is performed in the background, raising <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> events as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 当`true`，在后台执行分页引发<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>作为相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Pagination of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content, as distinct from a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is not affected by changes to the visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 分页的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>内容不同于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>不 visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>更改的影响</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background pagination is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已启用后台分页;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
trans-unit.target: 已对所有文档内容进行都分页时发生。

trans-unit.source: When PaginationCompleted occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true` until a new pagination is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 当 PaginationCompleted 发生时，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>是`true`直到启动新的分页。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more content pages have been paginated.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个内容页具有分页时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> properties <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> identify the range of pages paginated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>标识的页面已分页的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
